name: Dancesport Features | The plugin for dancing.
author: Fricke Media

sections.description:
Completes WordPress with cool features to build amazing websites around dancesport, dancing and dancers.

Dancesport Features is growing every day. These are the key features so far:

  • Make every user a “Dancer”! Dancesport Features adds a special user role called “Dancer”. A “Dancer” has a special user profile with additional dancesport information stored in it.
  • Manage dancesport results in a handy database! Dancers can add their successes to a database. Using shortcodes the database content can be placed anywhere on your club website to show up to your visitors.
  • Manage dancers and results from admin’s dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Dancesport Features.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. Enjoy dancing!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Dancesport Features.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. Enjoy dancing!

Will there be more features in the future?

Yes, Dancesport Features we are developing Dancesport Features every day in order to provide more features in the near future.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release

1.1

  • Fixed congratulate-function in public area.

1.2

  • Minor bug fixes

1.3

  • Added add-result-function to admin backend.
  • Added add-user-function to admin backend.
  • Added sample data function
  • Minor bug fixes

1.3.1

  • Fixed a problem with shortcodes displaying top of post content.

1.4

  • Introducing new shortcode [df_hide_content].
  • All public shortcodes are viewable by guests now.

1.4.1

  • Corrected HTML of public results table.
  • Added basic CSS to public results table.

upgrade_notice.1.3: Upgrade your Dancesport Feature with lots of simple improvements. Enjoy!
upgrade_notice.1.4: Update now to get a new shortcode and get some bugfixes.
upgrade_notice.1.4.1: Update now to get a correct viewing result table and some minor bugfixes.
